content.text:
# Jhalawar Lok Sabha constituency

Jhalawar () was a Lok Sabha constituency in Rajasthan state in western India till 2008. In 2008 re-organization, it morphed into Jhalawar-Baran (Lok Sabha constituency).
Assembly segments
Jhalawar Lok Sabha constituency comprised the following eight Vidhan Sabha (legislative assembly) segments:
# Kishanganj
# Atru
# Chhabra
# Khanpur
# Manohar Thana
# Jhalrapatan
# Pirawa
# Dag
